mapper.insert: INSERT INTO base_organization_team_menu ( pid, `name`, `code`, icon, is_used, create_date, remark,type,sort) VALUES (#{pid}, #{name}, #{code}, #{icon}, #{isUsed}, #{createDate}, #{remark},#{type},#{sort})
mapper.select: SELECT id, pid, `name`, `code`, icon, is_used isUsed, create_date createDate, remark, type, sort FROM base_organization_team_menu WHERE id = #{id}
